about_the_game:
About this DLC

The Ghost on the Desktop is a free add-on to Yuyuko's Butterfly Dream. It's a small program for desktop mascot.
Dynamic ghosts can accompany you in your work and study. Add a little fun to your desktop.

Function and usage

It's easy to use. Just download the DLC and run the program. When you close it, you need to turn it off by right-clicking in the taskbar.
At present, the function is relatively simple, you can drag the ghost to the right place on the desktop.

Will add functionality in the future?

Have this idea. If the response is good, we will discuss with the creator to add characters and animations. Or other functions.
However, the focus of the current work is to modify Yuyuko's Butterfly Dream and other game plans of the community.
Thank you again for your support.
